Description: Large rhomboid palette with projections at the ends of the shorter axis. Depression ground in center on one side. Thick walled; oval in cross-section. One side shows an integral patch of colour variation in the stone.
Curator's comments: Type 90D in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery and Palettes (1921) Palettes of this shape discussed in Petrie, Prehistoric Egypt (London 1920), p. 38; Baumgartel, The cultures of Prehistoric Egypt II (Oxford 1960), p. 83
